first.subHeader: The trick is, growing up without growing old
first.text: My journey in software development began with a spark of curiosity and a desire to create. I embarked on a path of continuous learning and exploration.

second.text: I have acquired a diverse set of skills. I'm proficient in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript having utilized the React & Angular Frameworks as well as TypeScript. For backend development, I have worked with technologies such as Java, Spring and Hibernate. Other technologies & tools include, Git, GitHub & GitLab, Jira & Confluence, RESTful APIs

third.subHeader: The future of the web is in your hands
third.text: Software development is not just a profession for me; it's my passion. I am captivated by the dynamic nature of the web and the endless possibilities it offers. Software development isn't just about writing code; it's about creating meaningful experiences that make a difference.
